layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 504x584 [border: (2px solid #000000)]
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (18,2) size 204x580 [border: (2px solid #800000)]
        LayoutBlockFlow (floating) {DIV} at (2,478) size 100x100 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
        LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 39x471
          text run at (2,2) width 279: "Here is some text in a vertical-rl block flow. "
          text run at (2,280) width 192: "The block direction is right-to-"
          text run at (22,2) width 24: "left."
        LayoutBR {BR} at (37,26) size 0x0
        LayoutText {#text} at (42,2) size 19x203
          text run at (42,2) width 203: "This line should also be vertical."
